name: BALLBOY: Trial of the Ball DEMO
name_original: BALLBOY: Trial of the Ball DEMO
description:
Ballboy is a top down shoot em  up boss rush game that is supposed to be challenging yet fun in which you play as a Ball that has to fight deadly opponents in the local colosseum.

! WARNING!

This game has blood. even though it is easily distinguishable from real life, you can go to the settings menu to turn off the blood if you wish.

CONTROLS:

Mouse - Aim

Left Click (Hold) - Shoot

Z - Change weapon

X - Change Charm

Arrow keys - Move
